project.name: jeveris Codegen Templates
project.description: Project with templates for code generation in j-everis project. This project is automatically created when a new j-everis project is created, and this project doesn't exist at the same level as the project. Don't change the name of the project. All j-everis projects in the same workspace need this project, and references it by this name. If this project name is changed, don't forget to change j-everis projects to reference the new project name (build-xxx.properties file).
